dt: {bc}a person who supports or engages in {d_link|feminism|feminism}

dt.t: Similarly, Saint Thomas's resident nun, Sister Maureen (Ann Dowd), is no girlish cutie: She's an ardent, in-your-face {wi}feminist{/wi}.
He [Stendhal] was a {wi}feminist{/wi} and … he held that to deprive women of education {lsquo}deprives society of half its potential for intellectual achievement{rsquo}.

shortdef: a person who supports or engages in feminism

dt.t: … the obviously {wi}anti-feminist{/wi} bias of these cultural and literary practices.

utxt.t: The current of {wi}anti-feminism{/wi} which developed in the newer religious orders …
… a publicly abusive faction of men's right advocates and {wi}anti-feminists{/wi} …
